Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a ring base, restricted mouth and simple lip, made from a fine pinkish clay. Two incised horizontal lines accentuate the location of the equatorial diametre on the exterior surface, which also bears a geometrical pattern painted in white. The latter is found directly below the lip and comprises two series of three vertical lines placed on either side of the vessel.
